医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
激素可能会驱动男性和女性滥用阿片类药物的差异根据美国国立卫生研究院的说法，自1999年以来，阿片类药物流行在美国夺去了超过500万人的生命，其中大约四分之三的男性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/hormones-may-drive-the-differences-in-opioid-misus-misuse-misuse-bet-men-and-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/hormones-may-drive-the-differences-in-opioid-misus-misuse-misuse-misuse-bet-men-and-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f6bf5e-52fe-4F86-BE73-9B624CDE8D97 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:19:40 -0400 Hormones may drive the differences in opioid misuse between men and women
压力和肥胖症会助长早期胰腺癌生长加州大学洛杉矶分校（UCLA）调查人员领导的一项新研究表明，慢性压力和不健康的饮食可能会共同助长胰腺癌的早期发展，从而阐明了生活方式因素如何导致最致命的恶性肿瘤之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/sress-ands-and--------------------to-found-to-fuel-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/sress-and---------------------------to-found-to-fuel-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860924D2-22-22d3-4CA1-AC7D-D0E1B46D2BBB Mon, 10 Mar 2025 14:05:00 -0400 Stress and obesity found to fuel early pancreatic cancer growth
突破性药物组合靶向肺癌中的KRAS突变肺癌治疗的突破可能会出现。 VCU Massey综合癌症中心的科学家已经发现了一种强大的组合疗法，该疗法利用了Sotorasib-An FDA批准的药物和一种称为FGTI-2734的实验药物，这可以使精度药物对具有高度抗性形式的肺癌的患者更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/breakthrough-drug-combination-targets-kras-kras-moint-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/breakthrough-drug-combination-targets-kras-kras-moint-in-nung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=664d62af-e52a-48CA-99ED-8C50C689C755 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:55:19 -0400 Breakthrough drug combination targets KRAS mutation in lung cancer
FDA警告不安全的紫外线棒进行消毒如果您使用紫外线魔杖对细菌进行消毒和杀死，或者正在考虑 - 请注意某些品牌可能会产生不安全的辐射水平，不应使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/fda-warns-against-unsafe-unsafe-uv-wands-for-disinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/fda-warns-against-unsafe-unsafe-uv-wands-for-disinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc8f407f-db82-482-48bc-beed-beed-c7fff4a4a220 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:26:16 -0400 FDA warns against unsafe UV wands for disinfection
科学家发现血液干细胞再生的关键分子开关根据Weill Cornell Medicine研究者的一项临床前研究，单个分子开关对于血液干细胞进入活化的，再生状态至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/scientists-discover-key-molecular-molecular-switch-for-blood-stem-stem-cell-regeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/scientists-discover-key-molecular-switch-for-for-blood-stem-cell-cell-regeneration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4f09d96-75a6-75a6-4a4c-bc9c-bc9c-baaad7a4445e3 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:18:11 -0400 Scientists discover key molecular switch for blood stem cell regeneration
研究揭示了传播过程中结核病生存至关重要的基因Weill Cornell Medicine和马萨诸塞州技术学院的研究人员说，结核菌细菌依靠一个基因家族，可以帮助他们在咳嗽，打喷嚏或说话期间从一个人的肺部到另一个人的挑战性旅程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-reveals-genes-genes-critical-for-tuberculcolisosis-survival-nervival-during-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-reveals-genes-genes-critical-for-tuberculcolisosis-survival-survival-during-dransmission-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A7DC352B-A93A-4BFD-B766-361B3B3BF35C14 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 13:06:07 -0400 Study reveals genes critical for tuberculosis survival during transmission
新的增压CAR-T细胞疗法显示出对抗性癌的有望科罗拉多大学Anschutz大学医学校园的研究人员成功地开发了CAR-T细胞疗法的增压迭代，可以提高细胞的有效性和寿命，尤其是针对先前CAR-T治疗更难检测和战斗的癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-supercharged-car-t-cell-therapy-shows-shows-promise-promise-agagagagagagagagagagainst-cancers-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-superchared-car-t-cell-therapy-shows-shows-shows-promise-promise-agagagagagagagagagagagagainst-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83b1c96c-8b3e-4f74-91bb-06a1312a8d73 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 12:48:47 -0400 New supercharged CAR-T cell therapy shows promise against resistant cancers
新的基于干细胞的血管移植物可以彻底改变心脏手术自从詹姆斯·汤姆森（James Thomson）孤立于1998年，威斯康星州 - 玛迪逊分校的科学家和威斯康星大学 - 麦迪逊分校的莫格里奇研究所的科学家一直处于干细胞研究和再生生物学的最前沿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-stem-cell-lase-cell-lase-call-Grafts-could-revolution-could-revolutionize-cardiac-surery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/new-stem-cell基于基于-cell-Grafts-could-revolution-could-revolutionize-cardiac-surery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d3d3d3d3d3d3d3-4b6f-b007-57-5f536c801046 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 12:34:59 -0400 New stem cell-based vascular grafts could revolutionize cardiac surgery
了解脑损伤的症状，诊断和治疗车祸。足球铲球。不幸的秋天。这些事情以及更多的东西可能会造成头部受伤。任何年龄的人都可能发生头部受伤，并且会损害大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/understanding-the-symptoms-dingnosis-and-woreatment-of-traumatic-brain-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/understanding-the-symptoms-dingnosis-and-woreatment-of-traumatic-brain-brain-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff6ad3d4-a3d3-4418-a93c-47e9d7876c9a Mon, 10 Mar 2025 11:59:59 -0400 Understanding the symptoms, diagnosis, and treatment of traumatic brain injury
研究深入研究了Sox9在Hypospadias发育中的作用Hypospadias是一种普遍存在的先天性疾病，其特征是尿道开口的异常位置，影响了全球多达3.42％的男性。除了身体后果之外，这种情况还会导致心理和生育问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-delves-into-the-the-the-po--sox9-in-hypospadias-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-delves-into-the-the-the-po--sox9-in-hypospadias-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc92b3b0-6b56-4135-9a24-5451de56c49a Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:50:29 -0400 Study delves into the role of SOX9 in hypospadias development
